title: Bug 117981: Unable to select any item in library outline view on first attempt
description: Description: When attempting to select an item in the library outline view, the selection does not occur on the first attempt.
OB: Observed behavior: When trying to select an item in the library outline view, the item does not get selected on the first attempt.
EB: Expected behavior: The item should be selected on the first attempt.
SR: Steps to reproduce: 1. Open the library outline view. 2. Try to select any item. It will not be selected. 3. Try to select the same item again. It should now be selected.
